channel.title: Updates
channel.description: Here you can see the latest updates of the product

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Increased inject speed.
Fixed various crashes.
Fixed various bugs.

● Rage
Improved aim stability.
Reworked resolver.
Added automatic stop modifiers.
Added force body aim if lethal option.
Now hide shots works with fake lag (limited to 6 ticks).
Fixed various bugs.

● Visuals
Added inferno indicator option.
Added smoke indicator option.
Added bomb timer option.
Added grenade warning.
Fixed various bugs.

● Misc
Fixed various bugs with automatic peek.
Added anti-untrusted option...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Cheat
  • Added anti-backshoot on manual shooting.
  • Improved yaw anti-aim correction.
  • Reworked anti-aim direction system.
  • Limited fake lag limit on valve servers.
  • Added choke indicator.
  • Added key bind on edge jump.
  • Fixed various bugs.

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Multithreading support has been temporarily removed (for reworking).
Fixed crashes related to loading some Lua scripts.
Fixed crashes related to recent game update.
Fixed various bugs.

● Rage
Improved aim stability.
Improved various bugs.

● Anti-aim
Added flick.

Also, 7 bonus days were added to all users with an active subscription. Soon we will be able to please you with a larger update of the cheat and the site, stay tuned!

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Rage
  • Recoded backtrack.
  • Recoded automatic penetration system.
  • Improved automatic stop.
  • Improved aimbot stability.
Anti-aim
  • Improved anti-aim logic.
  • Fixed various bugs.
Visuals
  • Added backtrack chams.
  • Added transparency in scope setting.
  • Fixed various bugs.

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Now all actions with configs occur without freezes.
Improved optimization.
Fixed various crashes.
Fixed various bugs.

● Rage
Improved animation system.
Improved aim stability.
Improved double tap stability.
Improved automatic stop.
Added force accuracy option.
Fixed various bugs.

● Anti-aim
Improved anti-aim logic.
Now fake duck works on Valve servers.
Fixed various bugs.

● Visuals
Changed automatic peek indicator design.
Changed grenade prediction design.
Reworked night mode...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Improved optimization.
Changed weapon groups. You need to reconfigure all the settings for each weapon group.
Fixed various crashes.
Fixed various bugs.

● Legit
Added key bind for aim working.
Added hitbox selection.
Added weapon group selection.
Added field of view.
Added field of view indicator when the menu is open.
Added smooth.
Added recoil control system function. You can configure pitch and yaw separately.
Added flash check.
Added smoke check.
Added backtrack limit.
Added...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Cheat has been updated for the latest game version
Now our product supports disabling lag compensation, using the command "cl_lagcompensation 0". This will allow you to shoot faster at opponents who use the lag/defensive exploit.
Note: this command can be changed only when you are in the game menu, or already on the map in the spectators.
Warning: disabling lag compensation may affect the accuracy of the aimbot and its operation in general, use it only when necessary.

● Misc
Added...

Read more

item.title: 21.06.2021 & extra days
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Fixed various bugs.
Added multithread support (beta). If you will have performance problems - set the value of the number of threads in your processor in the file threads.txt, which should be located on the desktop.

● Rage
Improved aim stability.
Improved hitbox selection.
Added lag exploit function (you will be lagging before the peeking).
Simplified setup for minimum damage. Now there is only 1 slider for setup (you need to re-set the minimum damage values in your configs).
Fixed...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Fixed some crashes.
Improved optimization.

● Anti-aim
Added manual anti-aim.

● Visuals
Added visualisation manual anti-aim.

● Misc
Added fast stop.
Added automatic peek.

● Settings
Fixed various bugs with config system.

item.title: 20.03.2021 & extra days
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Fixed glitched font in menu.
Fixed various crashes.

● Rage
Added early condition in automatic stop, works automatically in some cases.
Added automatic knife option, works automatically with toggled rage.
Fixed various bugs.

● Anti-aim
Added invert desync option, works only with static desync type.
Fixed various bugs.

● Visuals
Fixed various bugs.

● Misc
Added logs enabling option.

● Settings
Added refresh option in scripts list.

● Lua
Added menu.add_key_bind function.

It also...

Read more

item.title: 09.03.2021 & extra days
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
● Main
Fixed various crashes.

● Rage
Reworked automatic stop, now automatic stop option is displayed in the menu. You need to enable it in your config.
Improved firing when unscoped.
Fixed various bugs.

● Visuals
Added visualize lag option on fake chams.
Added layered option on fake chams.
Added thirdperson when spectating option, now thirdperson toggleable when you are looking for teammates.
Fixed various bugs.

● Misc
Added preserve killfeed option.
Fixed various bugs with autopeek.

●...

Read more

item.title: Legendware v2 | 23.03.2020
item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Menu
  • Added new menu.
  • Redesigned menu structure.
  • Added the ability to move in the menu.
  • Fixed various bugs.
Rage
  • Recoded jitter anti-aim correction.
  • Improved aimbot stability.
  • Improved automatic stop.
  • Added body aim level.
  • Recoded multi-point.
  • Added multi-point level.
  • Added safe body points.
  • Recoded exploits.
  • Added double tap hitchance.
  • Fixed various bugs.
Anti-aim
  • Added per movement type...

Read more

item.title: Legendware v4 | 04.03.2021
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
Legendware v4

● Main
Changed the user interface.
Changed the design of the forum.
Changed the loader design.

● Legit
Legitbot in development, soon to be completed.

● Rage
Fully recoded aimbot, exploits etc.

● Anti-aims
Fully recoded anti-aim system.

● Visuals
Fully redesigned visuals, added ESP preview.

● Misc
Added some missing and new options.

● Skins
Fully recoded skin changer, now it's an inventory changer.

● Settings
Fully reworked CFG system, they are now stored in the cloud...

Read more

item.title: Legendware v3 | 12.10.2020
item.author: invalid@example.com (LegendwareAdmin)
item.dc:creator: LegendwareAdmin
item.content:encoded:
General
● New user interface.
● Added ability to copy, paste and drag colors in color pickers.
● Added scripts editor.
● Note: you will need to create new configs, as the old ones will not work.

Rage
● Reworked resolver.
● Reworked aimbot with zeus.
● Reworked aimbot with knife.
● Reworked automatic scope, now it is adaptive.
● Reworked damage calculation system.
● Reworked wall penetration system.
● Reworked hitchance system.
●...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Cheat
  • Fixed some bugs with OOF arrows.
  • Fixed some crashes.
  • Fixed various bugs.

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Cheat
  • Reworked slow walk automatic stop.
  • Fixed some bugs with manual anti-aim.
  • Changed style of manual anti-aim arrows.
  • Fixed some bugs with preserve killfeed.
  • Added model changer.
  • Fixed various bugs.

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
[ Rage ]

● Improved accuracy while fake ducking.

[ Anti-aim ]
● Fixed bugs with LBY breaker.
● Added desync range setting.

[ Misc ]
● Recoded fake duck.
● Fixed various bugs.

[ Scripting ]
● Added developer mode setting.
● Added menu.set_bool function.
● Added menu.set_int function.
● Added...

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
[ General ]
● Fixed cheat for the latest game version.

[ Rage ]
● Added on double tap body aim condition (you need to set this conditions again).
● Improved enemy animation system.
● Improved hitchance optimization.
● Reworked accuracy boost calculation.
● Fixed some bugs with shot delaying on instant double tap.
● Fixed various bugs.

[ Anti-aim ]
● Fixed anti-aim logic with LBY breaker...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Rage
  • Improved double tap.
  • Added very high multi-points level.
  • Optimized multi-points.
  • Fixed fps drops with multi-points.
  • Added hide shots.
  • Fixed some bugs with exploits.
Visuals
  • Now the lag compensation hitboxes are visible through the walls.
  • Some visual improvements.

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Cheat
  • Changed style of tabs in menu.
  • Fixed some bugs with hitchance calculation.
  • Fixed some bugs with anti-aim direction.
  • Removed model changer (unstable).
  • Fixed some crashes.
  • Fixed various bugs.
